scripts.start: cd ../client1 && npm run build && rm -rf ../server/public && mkdir -p ../server/public && mv ./build/* ../server/public && cd ../server && node dist/server.js
scripts.make_ready_for_pm2: cd ../client1 && npm run build && rm -rf ../server/public && mkdir -p ../server/public && mv ./build/* ../server/public && cd ../server
